titleStmt.title: Mercvry, or, The secret and svvift messenger shewing, how a man may with privacy and speed communicate his thoughts to a friend at any distance.
titleStmt.author: Wilkins, John, 1614-1672.
Kinnaston, Francis, Sir, 1587-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Norton, for Iohn Maynard and Timothy Wilkins ...,

notesStmt.note: Commendatory poems by Sir Francis Kynaston and others.
